Name: Linea, the Game
About the game: The goal of the game is to survive for more than 60 seconds on each level, dodging platforms and objects, listening to bitpop soundtracks. Four levels, online-records, achievements and trading cards are waiting for you. Features: Challenging gameplay, aimed at reaction Four unique levels, each with its difficulty, design and music More than 20 achievements, 7 of them are hidden Online leaderboards Steam trading cards
Meta Title: Linea, the Game: Jan 4, 2016, KHB-Soft and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Linea, the Game? Check out the release date (Jan 4, 2016), developer insights from KHB-Soft, and a complete game summary.
